short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to let you open links in the same tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Some sites annoyingly open links in new tabs. This extension lets you take back control. There are two ways to use it:
1) right click a link, select "Open in the same tab"
2) hold the "t" key (as in Tab) as you click the link
